thread.title: Loose Women viewers amazed as Andrea McLean shows off incredible figure dressed as Cher in skin-tight leotard
thread.title_full: Loose Women viewers amazed as Andrea McLean shows off incredible figure dressed as Cher in skin-tight leotard

author: Hayley Minn
title: Loose Women viewers amazed as Andrea McLean shows off incredible figure dressed as Cher in skin-tight leotard
text:
Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Loose Women viewers were amazed today as Andrea McLean showed off her incredible figure dressed as Cher. 
The ITV daytime show’s panel were dressed up as famous pop stars for the 70s and 80s special, which saw Marc Almond and David Essex star too. 
As they came on the show, Andrea was dressed as Cher, Martine McCutcheon was Cyndi Lauper, Linda Robson was Dolly Parton and Kaye Adams was Abba. 
But it was Andrea - who was wearing a big perm, over-the-knee stiletto boots, leotard and leather jacket - who made the most impact. Read More Andrea McLean showed off her incredible figure (Photo: ITV) She was dressed as Cher (Photo: ITV) 
Paddy McGuinness was in the green room and said: “I’m a married man, but Andrea… Phwoar! 
“I’m enjoying this daytime TV thing.” 
And viewers of Loose Women were also in agreement with the Take Me Out host. 
Sophie Gradon from Love Island said: “Holy s**t how amazing does @andrea_mclean look!!! Hawt diggedy dawg! #loosewomen.” Read More Martine McCutcheon dressed up as Cyndi Lauper (Photo: ITV) They were having a 70s vs 80s episode (Photo: ITV) 
Another added: “wow, you all look great but Andrea's figure though #LooseWomen.” 
A third agreed: “Omg how good does @andrea_mclean look?? What a figure.” 
And if that wasn’t enough, Soft Cell singer Marc told her: “You look better than Cher.” 
*Loose Women continues on ITV1 weekdays at 12.30pm Like us on Facebook
